title: Bitcoinking99
author: Bitcoinking99
created_time: February 08, 2023, 04:02:19 AMLast edit: March 07, 2023, 05:32:11 AM by Bitcoinking99
content: _________________________________________________________ Website   Twitter  Telegram   Instagram  Twitter   Telegram _________________________________________________________        Bounty campaign will be managed by Bitcoinking991. $5000 worth of $99krypto are allocated for this Bounty.   Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you     acknowledge that the wallet address and the email     address you submitted are final and can't be changed,     bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to     the conditions at any time.    Bitcoinking99 team can't assure the project's success     as our duty is to provide a bounty management service     for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for     managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the     project's success and continuity. Participating in this     bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own    risk.      Note: the rewards distribution guarantee by project team.      1. All participants must join Bounty telegram group      2. Refrain from promoting talking about bounty        programs in project chat groups.       An immediate ban from company chat groups.        Please ask your bounty-related questions in our        bounty group.      3. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate        behavior may result in your being rejected.      4. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming       will get you disqualified from the bounty program and       all your accounts will be permanently banned.      5. Red Trust accounts will not be accepted in any way.      6. All participants must submit their weekly reports to       this bounty thread. For every week, you need to create       new report. Anyone submitting the same work twice       will be rejected.      7. All participants must send the Proof of       Authentication post to join the bounty program.                        #PROOF OF REGISTRATION      Code:                                        Forum Username:                               Forum Profile Link:                              Telegram Username:                              Participated Campaigns:                              BSC Wallet Address:                                    1 WEEK - 08.02 - 14.02                                    2 WEEK - 15.02 - 21.02                                    3WEEK  - 22.02 - 28.02                                    4 WEEK - 01.03 - 07.03                                    5 week  - 08.03 - 14-03                                    6 week - 15.03 - 21.03                                    7 week - 22.03 - 28.03                                Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/week                                Rules:  1. Every participant must follow 99krypto  Twitter Page 2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #99krypto #token #bsc #cryptocurrency #presale #erc20                                          How to join                                                           Rewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/week                            Rules:  1. Every participant must follow 99krypto  Instagram page 2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. At least 5 likes and 5 comments per photo per week.4. Participants must use #99krypto #token #bsc #cryptocurrency #presale #erc20                                          How to join                      Rewards:                          5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | 99krypto (Example: Bitcoinking99 |2. Replace your profile picture with 99krypto  Logo.                         Rules:1. Must join 99krypto  Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency  group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!6. Participants must use #99krypto #token #bsc #cryptocurrency #presale #erc20                                     How to join                   Rewards:                       High quality: 5 stakes                       Good quality: 3 stakes                      Average quality: 1 stake                        Rules:1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features,  Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!                                   How to join
